name: IGuzziniSmartLight
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The skill works in combination with iGuzzini Quick BLE system and the “iGuzzini Smart Light 2” app,
downloadable from Google Play Store, and Apple App Store.
To get started, select the “enable skill” button and then link the account via the same username
password of the “Smart Light 2” app.
Discover new devices using the Alexa app menu -add device -Lamp type-other.
It is also possible to add new devices by voice, as below:
Alexa, discover my devices
The skill will find all the devices,Groups,lamps,scenes named as in the “Smart Light 2” app.
Now you are ready. The interaction example is given below:
Alexa, turn on “meeting room” light
Alexa, turn off “Shop” light
Alexa, set “showroom” light to 50 percent
It is possible to use the Alexa app routines to create scenes and or series of automated actions. By
doing so, it will be possible to use any command phrase you like (regardless of the name given to the
devices,scenes,lamps in the 'Smart Light 2' app).
Alexa, “set presentation mode”
Alexa, “I’m leaving the office”
For each device operation, the Alexa app will receive notification on successful device operation.
